entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:29 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:29 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:29 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
